caption:
💥𝙂𝙄𝙑𝙀 𝙄𝙏 𝘼𝙒𝘼𝙔 𝙉𝙊𝙒!!!💥
 
Let’s giveaway some new 2025 products! With this exclusive NEW PRODUCT GIVEAWAY, one lucky winner will get a bundle of the latest and greatest detailing formulas we’ve come up with! This giveaway closes Monday, May 19th, 2025, at 8 am PST. So, enter now for your chance to win!
———————
 How to Play:
1. Tag 3 friends in the comments section of THIS post ⤵️
2. Repost THIS giveaway to your Instagram Stories
3. Follow @meguiars on Instagram & Like THIS post
——————— 
Feel free to enter as many times as you like to increase your chances of winning!! To do so, you must tag three people on each comment line. Good Luck!! Please know that the winner will be contacted by DM from the official@meguiars account only. Any other account that says you won is fake.
NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Open to US residents who are 18 or over. Ends May 19, 2025, at 8 am PST. Void where prohibited. For Official Rules, go to https://www.meguiars.com/sweepstakes
